prompt: A young boy, around 8 years old, runs through a golden wheat field, his red kite dancing dynamically in the sky.  The sun sets, casting long shadows.  The scene opens with a wide shot, then transitions to a close-up of the boy's face as he laughs.  The camera smoothly follows the boy as he runs, incorporating slow-motion shots of the kite soaring.  Use a shallow depth of field to emphasize the boy and kite.  The video should conclude with a shot of the kite silhouetted against the setting sun.  Style: photorealistic, cinematic. Color palette: warm, golden hues with accents of red from the kite.  Camera movement: smooth tracking shots, some slow-motion.
